parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> [[Image:safezone.jpg|600px]]<br><br>

Returns the width of the screen in screen measurement units. Taken from top left corner of the default viewport (0,0) of the screen and going in the same direction as the X axis, the value will be positive but resulting X will end up beyond the right border. Therefore in order to calculate X of the right screen border, the length of [[safeZoneX]] must be subtracted from [[safeZoneW]], but because it is negative, it must be added instead. <tt>_screenRightBorderX <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[safeZoneW]] + [[safeZoneX]]</tt>. The measurement units depend on the current screen resolution [[getResolution]]. See also [[SafeZone]] </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''safeZoneW''' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value>  <code>_screenWidth = [[safeZoneW]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value>  <code>_screenRightBorderX = [[safeZoneW]] + [[safeZoneX]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[SafeZone]], [[safeZoneX]], [[safeZoneY]], [[safeZoneH]], [[safeZoneXAbs]], [[safeZoneWAbs]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 
</value></part></template>
